item.title: Free Tickets For Heritage Action Skills Clinic Thursday **Only 20 Tix Left!**
item.description: Ben Evans of Heritage Action has free tickets for his Activist Skills Training. There are still tickets available to the Skills Clinic on Thursday, February 27: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/stl-skills-tickets-10683495623 Holding Congress accountable can be tough work. Whether you are new to the fight or a seasoned activist, the Heritage Action Skills Clinic will help you better engage Congress, so your voice can be heard. Join fellow liberty-minded, conservatives for this FREE training as we provide the tools to take meaningful action.
